initial:
A split component is connected to a html component using method:
Konekti.split(id, type='col', percentage=50)
AttributeDescription
idHTML component to associate with the split component
typeType of split, 'col':Vertical, 'hor':Horizontal.
percentagePercentage of the first subcomponent relative to the component's size.
oneLeft/Top component.
twoRight/Bottom component.
